summary: This mod overhauls some un-immersive and unlogical things like smithing arrows at the forge.
descriptionHtml:
[font=\"Verdana\"][center][color=Crimson][size=7][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pAVzwLq.png[/IMG][/size][/color][/center] 
[line]
[center][color=Crimson][size=4]by darkfr3ak[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=Crimson][size=3]Version:[/size][/color]              0.9
[color=Crimson][size=3]Date:[/size][/color]                 17.10.2013
[color=Crimson][size=3]Category:[/size][/color]           Immersion
[line] 
This mod requires the Dawnguard DLC to work. 
Optional Files require the respective Originals.

English images are appreciated.
[line] 

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]This mod overhauls some un-immersive and unlogical things like smithing arrows at the forge.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]How logical is it, to \"forge\" arrows, which are mostly ade of wood, at a forge. I thought, fire would burn wood, so i created a new item, which is used to carve arrows.

At the forge, under the Iron-Section, you will find a \"carving knife\" which you can use from now on to create your arrows and bows.

What this mod changes:

- Arrows from Dawnguard are created with the carving knife
- all bows require a bowstring, which can be created at the tanning rack
- the longbow and the huntingbow are created with the carving knife

[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]You can find the carving knife under the Iron-Section at the forge and the bowstring at the tanningrack.
The inlays (used for some wooden weapons) can be crafted at any forge.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Compatibility Patches[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*]Immersive Weapons ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30154]Immersive Weapons German[/url] required)
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Whats coming next[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*]Insert a \"crafting-kit\" where you can tailor leather-armors, robes and armor-parts which use leather or cloth
[*]Insert new materials for creating leather-armors (leather-pieces, threads and cloth-pieces) - [color=Crimson]partially done[/color]
[*]Move wood-weapons to the carving knife - [color=Crimson]done[/color]
[*]Insert new materials for creating Arrows (Feathers and Arrowheads)

[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on the steam network.
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=Crimson]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Before you use the content first contact me and ask for permission.[/center] 
[line]
[center][size=2][color=Crimson]ReadMe generated with: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22340]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url][/color][/size][/center] 
[/font]
